course_title: Catholicism in America: Migration, Transnationalism, & Devotion
course_description: Catholicism in the U.S. has often been called a "Church of immigrants." In this course, we will evaluate that claim by examining the relationship between Catholicism and migration from theological, historical, and sociological perspectives.
schedule_location: W 2:30pm-5:30pm in Rita Anne Rollins Building_549
sections: Class Nbr: 5817, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 2:30-5:30p, Instructor: S. Reynolds, Status: Open
